Guardian:ChargeUp.NAME: Charge Up
Guardian:ChargeUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !M! temporary Strength.

Guardian:DonusPower.NAME: Overload
Guardian:DonusPower.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Cards. NL Reduce each of your debuffs by 1.
Guardian:DonusPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Cards. NL Reduce each of your debuffs by 1.

Guardian:FierceBash.NAME: Fierce Bash
Guardian:FierceBash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Place this into guardianmod:Stasis. NL guardianmod:Tick - Increase this card's damage by !M!.

Guardian:PolyBeam.NAME: Poly Beam
Guardian:PolyBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

Guardian:GuardianWhirl.NAME: Guardian Whirl
Guardian:GuardianWhirl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 2 times. NL If you have 16 or more Block, deal damage !M! more times.

Guardian:CurlUp.NAME: Curl Up
Guardian:CurlUp.DESCRIPTION: Place a random card from your hand into guardianmod:Stasis. NL guardianmod:Brace !M!.
Guardian:CurlUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Place a card in your hand into guardianmod:Stasis. NL guardianmod:Brace !M!.

Guardian:TimeBomb.NAME: Time Bomb
Guardian:TimeBomb.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL guardianmod:Accelerate ALL cards in *Stasis. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:HyperBeam_Guardian.NAME: Giga Beam
Guardian:HyperBeam_Guardian.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Strength affects this card !M! times. NL Skip your next turn.

Guardian:BronzeArmor.NAME: Resilient Plate
Guardian:BronzeArmor.DESCRIPTION: Reduce each of your debuffs by !M!. NL guardianmod:Brace 8. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:BronzeArmor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reduce each of your debuffs by !M!. NL guardianmod:Brace 8.

Guardian:FloatingOrbs.NAME: Floating Orbs
Guardian:FloatingOrbs.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a 0-Cost card, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

Guardian:Orbwalk.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL guardianmod:Tick - Gain 1 Strength. NL guardianmod:Volatile.
Guardian:Orbwalk.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL guardianmod:Tick - Gain 1 Strength.

Guardian:SphericShield.NAME: Spheric Shield
Guardian:SphericShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Enter guardianmod:Defensive *Mode. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:Harden.NAME: Harden
Guardian:Harden.DESCRIPTION: Requires 20 or more Block. NL guardianmod:Brace !GuardianSecondM! and gain !M! Thorns.

Guardian:SentryBeam.NAME: Sentry Blast
Guardian:SentryBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Place a *Sentry *Wave into guardianmod:Stasis. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:SentryBeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Place a *Sentry *Wave+ into guardianmod:Stasis. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:SentryWave.NAME: Sentry Wave
Guardian:SentryWave.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Place a *Sentry *Blast into guardianmod:Stasis. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:SentryWave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL guardianmod:Brace 2. NL Place a *Sentry *Blast+ into guardianmod:Stasis. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:CompilePackage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose an Upgraded guardianmod:Package to place into guardianmod:Stasis. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:PackageSentry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain a *Sentry *Blast+ and two *Sentry *Waves+. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:Planning.NAME: Planning
Guardian:Planning.DESCRIPTION: Place the top !M! cards of your draw pile into guardianmod:Stasis.

Guardian:Recover.NAME: Recover
Guardian:Recover.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL guardianmod:Brace !M!. NL Place a card from your discard pile into guardianmod:Stasis.

Guardian:Emergency.NAME: Emergency
Guardian:Emergency.DESCRIPTION: guardianmod:Accelerate ALL cards in guardianmod:Stasis. NL Exhaust.
Guardian:Emergency.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: guardianmod:Accelerate ALL cards in guardianmod:Stasis twice. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:Clone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. NL Place a copy of that card into guardianmod:Stasis. NL guardianmod:Accelerate. NL Exhaust.

Guardian:Repulse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you draw the first Status or Curse card each turn, Exhaust it and draw a card.
